Class Cursor

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
SmoothMover
Cursor
public class Cursor extends SmoothMover
Cursor for selecting robots to watch their state. Supplementary material to the book: "Reinforcement Learning From Scratch: Understanding Current Approaches - with Examples in Java and Greenfoot" by Uwe Lorenz. https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-031-09030-1 Ausgabe auf Deutsch: https://link.springer.com/book/9783662683101 Licensing CC-BY-SA 4.0 Attribution - Sharing under the same conditions I have opened the license in the current version (non-commercial has been removed), for example to enable use in adult education centers, private educational institutions or commercial educational offers. Ich habe die Lizenz in der aktuellen Version geöffnet (nicht-kommerziell wurde entfernt), um bspw. die Nutzung der Software in Volkshochschulen, privaten Bildungseinrichtungen oder kommerziellen Bildungsangeboten zu ermöglichen. www.x-ai.eu github.com/sn-code-inside/Reinforcement-Learning
Version:
1.2 (14.11.2023)
Author:
Uwe Lorenz
